title: Using Routines, I get GAssistant to turn OFF DND, I can't get it to turn ON.
content: Using Routines, I get GAssistant to turn OFF DND, I can't get it to turn ON. Has spent hours on this. I can get GAssistant to turn on/off flashlight, without problem, even to start a third party radio app. But turning on Do Not Disturb has proved impossible. I have been able to get GAssistant to "say" they are turning on DND, but nothing happens. Please, advise.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4a (5G)
